definition: to dredge/to clear away obstruction/thin/sparse/scanty/distant (relation)/not close/to neglect/negligent/to present a memorial to the Emperor/commentary/annotation

sentences.english: He therefore thought that the use of their negligence, earn ill- gotten gains.
sentences.chinese: 于是他就想到，利用他们的疏忽，赚取不义之财。
损害系由贵公司疏忽所致。

sentences.english: I think this is one of the bus IC card design negligence.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得，这是公交IC卡的一个设计上的疏忽。

sentences.english: The complaint alleged that the driver had committed various negligent acts and omissions .
sentences.chinese: 原告诉称驾驶员实施了各种疏忽的作为与不作为。

sentences.english: Ravi lost his mother at the age of 16 months as a result of prejudice and negligence.
sentences.chinese: 因为歧视和疏忽，拉菲在十六个月大的时侯丧母。

sentences.english: In the selection the lecturer neglected the negligible negative reflection on the election.
sentences.chinese: 在全集结演讲者疏忽了对选举的眇乎小哉的扫兴深思。

sentences.english: He is chargeable with a fault or neglect.
sentences.chinese: 他可能因过失或疏忽而被控告。

sentences.english: One should never blame his friends even his friends committed some careless mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 当朋友犯了疏忽的小错时不要老指责朋友的过失。

sentences.english: This must be handled well. No negligence is permitted.
sentences.chinese: 定当，不能有丝毫的疏忽。

sentences.english: This is the first and most serious example of medical negligence in the island's modern history.
sentences.chinese: 这是台湾现代历史上首例也是最严重的一例医疗疏忽。

sentences.english: Perhaps it was my negligence of giving considerable care to parents.
sentences.chinese: 还是自己对父母的关心体贴疏忽了。

sentences.english: Not carelessness was allowed. No one could assure Qinghe.
sentences.chinese: 此时不可以有半点疏忽。

sentences.english: The  committee admits it  committed an  omission in  commissioning the  mission.
sentences.chinese: 委员会承认它在委任使团时犯的疏忽。

sentences.english: While you enjoy the catchy song, don't miss the band's trademark dancing moves.
sentences.chinese: 观赏这些动听歌的同时可别疏忽了乐队的招牌舞姿。

sentences.english: The oversight issued in heavy losses.
sentences.chinese: 那次疏忽造成了重大损失。

sentences.english: As sheepherders, Zang and Gu lost some sheep due to their neglect.
sentences.chinese: 臧与谷两个牧羊人，他们都因疏忽而丢失了一些羊。

definition: to slip/to overlook by negligence/careless omission/oversight
to lose one's job/unemployment/not to fulfill one's obligations/to neglect one's job/dereliction of duty
to neglect to take precautions/relaxed vigilance
to fail to pay sufficient attention to/to be negligent in regard to/to be lacking in
